title: GoSYNQ
description: Zero-fee ticketing for event promoters. The anti-Eventbrite. Built landing pages, Stripe integration, QR scanning, and audience database. Saves promoters 10-15% in platform fees while giving them full ownership of their audience.

title: AI Operator Roadmap
description: Free course: Zero to AI consultant. 15 comprehensive modules teaching people to build AI systems and start consulting. Three learning paths, project-based, 100% free. No fluff, just practical skills. A complete collection of everything I know about AI.

title: Dizzy Otter
description: AI consultancy for modern businesses. Custom AI solutions, workflow automation, and business transformation. 'Client OS' packages including Notion dashboards, personalized GPTs, and automated outreach systems. Making AI accessible without the complexity.

title: LeadGen OS
description: Multi-tenant SaaS for lead generation agencies. Operating system for lead gen agencies. Full CRUD functionality, multi-tenant architecture, agency management, lead tracking, and automation workflows. Built to streamline operations at scale.

title: Calorie Bank
description: Weekly calorie budgeting app. Rethinks calorie tracking using banking metaphors. Deposit calories through exercise, withdraw through food. Focuses on weekly balance instead of daily restrictions.

title: Lead My Business
description: B2B lead generation company website. Modern single-page website for account-based B2B lead generation BPO company. Clean design, service showcase, GDPR-compliant legal documents, optimized for conversion.

title: Vibehaus Media
description: Social media marketing agency website. Bold, personality-driven website for strategy-first social media agency. Modern design, portfolio showcase, clear service positioning. Built for conversion with strong brand personality.
